synopsis.text: Kazuma Kuwabara, Hiei, and Kurama join forces with Yuusuke Urameshi, a once troublesome teenager, as he embarks on a journey to redeem himself and protect humanity from menacing demons. After sacrificing his life to save a child, Yuusuke becomes a ghost and is given the opportunity by Koenma, the heir to the throne of the spirit realm, to earn his way back into existence. As a Spirit Detective, Yuusuke and his unlikely allies face battles with high stakes, where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance. Created by Togashi Yoshihiro, Yu Yu Hakusho follows the group's adventures as they navigate the spirit realm and defend against evil forces.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
